img_above_text:
![Wukong LowerHollow 45.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b4/Wukong_LowerHollow_45.jpg)
He can also steal a trick from Guangzhi and use his rake like a pogo stick, slamming down with it before hopping up and spin into another downward slash attack.
img_below_text:
When he starts spinning his rake in a low, wide arc, he can continue to spin until turning into a literal tornado. It can be hard to dodge at first, but once you do he'll have a hard time course-correcting, and you can follow his path until he spins himself dizzy.
![Wukong LowerHollow 43.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c2/Wukong_LowerHollow_43.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 42 from the file 'Webbed_Hollow_-_Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong LowerHollow 45.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b4/Wukong_LowerHollow_45.jpg)
He can also steal a trick from Guangzhi and use his rake like a pogo stick, slamming down with it before hopping up and spin into another downward slash attack."
            - Following Text: "When he starts spinning his rake in a low, wide arc, he can continue to spin until turning into a literal tornado. It can be hard to dodge at first, but once you do he'll have a hard time course-correcting, and you can follow his path until he spins himself dizzy.
![Wukong LowerHollow 43.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c2/Wukong_LowerHollow_43.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a combat scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," featuring a character named Zhu Bajie. He is seen using his rake as a weapon, engaging in a dynamic attack against an opponent. The preceding text describes Zhu Bajie's ability to use his rake like a pogo stick for a powerful downward slash, while the following text details his spinning rake attack that turns into a tornado. This image visually represents the intense and varied combat mechanics of Zhu Bajie in the game.
